page.title: 04Nursery Sch/Playgroup Sheff.
page.content: The{Wincobank Playgroup}children age 2\-3\ meet at the community centre on Tuesdays, Wednesdays and Fridays. 25 children go each session and pay 35p each for 2\ hours. There are 4 leaders and one helper. They play with small and big toys and have a drink and a story. The{Nursery School}is part of the main school and was opened in 1977 for children of 3-4\ years. There is one teacher and two helpers. 39 children go in the morning and a different 39 in the afternoon. The Nursery is one big room with 3 smaller play areas for painting, noisy and quiet activities. It is a nice place, they like it at the Nursery. They enjoy playing inside at Lego and in the sand and the house. Outside they play with big toys. Sometimes they use the school hall for P.E. and they come to our concerts.
